queries.description: INTERSECT ALL is not supported by H2, so we use hardcoded output to validate the query
queries.sql: SELECT intCol FROM {tbl1} INTERSECT ALL SELECT intCol FROM {tbl2}

queries.description: EXCEPT ALL is not supported by H2, so we use hardcoded output to validate the query
queries.sql: SELECT intCol FROM {tbl1} EXCEPT ALL SELECT intCol FROM {tbl2}

queries.description: MINUS ALL is not supported by H2, so we use hardcoded output to validate the query
queries.sql: SELECT intCol FROM {tbl1} MINUS ALL SELECT intCol FROM {tbl2}
